Package de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.util

Class GuiUtils

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.util.GuiUtils
public final class GuiUtils extends Object
Utility class with static utitlity methods for GUI
Author:
Achim Zielesny

  • Method Details

    • setResourceImage

      public static void setResourceImage(CustomPanelImage anImagePanel, String anImageResourceFilename)
      Sets image of resource. NOTE: ImageIO is not thread safe! (thus synchronized)
      Parameters:
      anImagePanel - CustomPanelImage instance
      anImageResourceFilename - Resource filename of image

    • getImageOfResource

      public static BufferedImage getImageOfResource(String anImageResourceFilename)
      Returns specified image of resource. NOTE: ImageIO is not thread safe! (thus synchronized)
      Parameters:
      anImageResourceFilename - Image filename that is in resource
      Returns:
      Image of resource or null if specified versioned image does not exist

    • getVersionedImageOfResource

      public static BufferedImage getVersionedImageOfResource(String anImageResourceFilenamePrefix, String anImageResourceEnding, int aVersion)
      Returns specified versioned image of resource. NOTE: ImageIO is not thread safe! (thus synchronized)
      Parameters:
      anImageResourceFilenamePrefix - Prefix of versioned image filename that is in resource
      anImageResourceEnding - Ending of versioned image filename that is in resource
      aVersion - Version
      Returns:
      Specified versioned image of resource or null if specified versioned image does not exist

      Starts default browser with specified URI
      Parameters:
      aURI - URI
      Returns:
      false: Startup process failed, true: Otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      false: Startup process failed, true: Otherwise

    • expandAndRetainSelection

      public static void expandAndRetainSelection(JTree aTree, boolean anExpandFlag)
      If expand is true all nodes of the tree are expanded. Otherwise all nodes of the tree are collapsed. Retains selection.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      anExpandFlag - True: Expands all nodes in the tree , collapses otherwise.

    • expandAndSelectFirstLeaf

      public static void expandAndSelectFirstLeaf(JTree aTree, boolean anExpandFlag)
      If expand is true all nodes of the tree are expanded. Otherwise all nodes of the tree are collapsed. Selects first leaf.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      anExpandFlag - True: Expands all nodes in the tree , collapses otherwise.

    • expandAndSelectFirstOfBlock

      public static void expandAndSelectFirstOfBlock(JTree aTree, boolean anExpandFlag, String aBlockName)
      If expand is true all nodes of the tree are expanded. Otherwise all nodes of the tree are collapsed. Selects first leaf/value item with block name.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      anExpandFlag - True: Expands all nodes in the tree, collapses otherwise
      aBlockName - Block name

    • expandAndSelectDefinedLeaf

      public static void expandAndSelectDefinedLeaf(JTree aTree, boolean anExpandFlag, String aValueItemName)
      If expand is true all nodes of the tree are expanded. Otherwise all nodes of the tree are collapsed. Selects leaf/value item with defined name.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      anExpandFlag - True: Expands all nodes in the tree, collapses otherwise
      aValueItemName - Value item name

    • fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectFirstLeaf

      public static void fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectFirstLeaf(JTree aTree, ValueItem[] aValueItemArray, ValueItemEnumStatus aValueItemStatus)
      Fills tree with value items and selects first value item. NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      aValueItemArray - Value item array (NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree)
      aValueItemStatus - Value item status: Only value items that match status are filled into tree

    • fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectFirstOfBlock

      public static void fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectFirstOfBlock(JTree aTree, ValueItem[] aValueItemArray, ValueItemEnumStatus aValueItemStatus, String aBlockName)
      Fills tree with value items and selects first value item of defined block. NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      aValueItemArray - Value item array (NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree)
      aValueItemStatus - Value item status: Only value items that match status are filled into tree
      aBlockName - Block name

    • fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectDefinedLeaf

      public static void fillTreeWithValueItemsAndSelectDefinedLeaf(JTree aTree, ValueItem[] aValueItemArray, ValueItemEnumStatus aValueItemStatus, String aValueItemName)
      Fills tree with value items and selects value item with defined name. NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree.
      Parameters:
      aTree - Tree
      aValueItemArray - Value item array (NOTE: All value items MUST have a node name array with identical first string which will be the root of the tree)
      aValueItemStatus - Value item status: Only value items that match status are filled into tree
      aValueItemName - Value item name

      anExtensionFileFilter - FileFilter for extensions (may be null)
      Returns:

      public static String selectSingleFileForSave(String aTitleLabel, String anExtension)
      Manages complete selection for file save procedure: Selection of filename and possible overwrite
      Parameters:
      aTitleLabel - Title/Label for file chooser window and approve button
      anExtension - Extension of file
      Returns:
      Full pathname of file to be saved to or null if file cannot be saved with selected name

    • selectJobInputInList

      public static void selectJobInputInList(JList aJobInputList, JobInput aJobInputToBeSelected)
      Selects job input in list if possible
      Parameters:
      aJobInputList - List of job inputs
      aJobInputToBeSelected - Job input to be selected

    • createChart

      public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(ValueItem aValueItem, int aXValueColumn, int aYValueColumn, int aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints, double[] aZoomValues, boolean anIsThickLines, boolean anIsShapePaint, boolean anIsFillColorWhite, boolean anIsOutlinePaintWhite, int aNumberToAverage)
      Creates bar or XY chart from value item data. NOTE: There are no checks performed.
      Parameters:
      aValueItem - Value item
      aXValueColumn - X-value column
      aYValueColumn - Y-value column
      aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints - Number of initial points to be discarded
      aZoomValues - {xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax} for zoom
      anIsThickLines - True: Thick lines, false: Thin lines
      anIsShapePaint - True: Shapes are painted, false: Shapes are not painted
      anIsFillColorWhite - If shapes are painted: True: Fill color of shapes is white, false: Fill color of shapes is default color
      anIsOutlinePaintWhite - If shapes are painted: True: Outline of shapes is white, false: Outline of shapes is default color
      aNumberToAverage - Number of y-values to average
      Returns:
      Chart or null if chart could not be created

    • getDataBoundariesOfValueItemMatrix

      public static double[] getDataBoundariesOfValueItemMatrix(ValueItem aValueItem, int aXValueColumn, int aYValueColumn, int aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints)
      Returns double array with { xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax}
      Parameters:
      aValueItem - Value item
      aXValueColumn - X-value column
      aYValueColumn - Y-value column
      aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints - Number of initial points to be discarded
      Returns:
      Double array with { xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax} or null if array could not be created

    • getStatisticsString

      public static String getStatisticsString(ValueItem aValueItem, int aXValueColumn, int aYValueColumn, int aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints, double[] aZoomValues)
      Creates statistics string from value item data (see code). NOTE: There are no checks performed.
      Parameters:
      aValueItem - Value item
      aXValueColumn - X-value column
      aYValueColumn - Y-value column
      aNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints - Number of initial points to be discarded
      aZoomValues - {xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax} for zoom
      Returns:
      Statistics string or null if chart could not be created

    • invertImage

      public static BufferedImage invertImage(BufferedImage aSourceImage)
      Inverts image
      Parameters:
      aSourceImage - Source image to be inverted (is NOT changed)
      Returns:
      Inverted image

    • getYesNoDecision

      public static boolean getYesNoDecision(String aTitle, String aMessage)
      Returns yes/no decision
      Parameters:
      aTitle - Title of message
      aMessage - Message
      Returns:
      True: Yes, false: No

      public static void showUnderConstructionInformation()
      Under-construction information display

    • configureCustomPanelValueItemEdit

      public static void configureCustomPanelValueItemEdit(CustomPanelValueItemEdit aCustomPanelValueItemEdit, boolean anIsValueItemStatusSelectionShown, boolean anIsHintTabRemoved, boolean anIsErrorTabRemoved, boolean anIsSchemaManagement)
      Configures CustomPanelValueItemEdit
      Parameters:
      aCustomPanelValueItemEdit - CustomPanelValueItemEdit to configure
      anIsValueItemStatusSelectionShown - True: Value items status selections are shown, false: Otherwise
      anIsHintTabRemoved - True: Hint tab is removed, false: Hint tab is shown
      anIsErrorTabRemoved - True: Error tab is removed, false: Error tab is shown
      anIsSchemaManagement - True: Schema management is available, false: Schema management not shown/available

      public static void setCompartmentsImage(CustomPanelImage anImagePanel)
      Sets compartments image
      Parameters:
      anImagePanel - CustomPanelImage instance

      anImageResourceEnding - Ending of versioned image filename that is in resource
      Returns:
      Specified image of resource with current of default version or null if specified image does not exist

      Parameters:

      aVersion - Version

      Parameters:
      aPdbToDPD - A PdbToDpd instance (is NOT changed)
      Returns:
      ActiveProteinChainsValueItem or null if none could be created

    • createMovieImages

      public static void createMovieImages(IImageProvider anImageProvider, boolean anIsBackwards, String anImageDirectoryPathForMovies)
      Creates movie images NOTE: No further checks are performed.
      Parameters:
      anImageProvider - IImageProvider instance
      anIsBackwards - True: Images are additionally supplied in backward
      anImageDirectoryPathForMovies - Image directory path for movies order, false: Otherwise (forward only)

    • addRotationChangeValueItem

      public static void addRotationChangeValueItem(ValueItemContainer aValueItemContainer, int aVerticalPosition, String[] aNodeNames, String aValueItemName, SimulationBoxChangeInfo aSimulationBoxChangeInfo)
      Adds rotation change value item with name ModelDefinitions.ROTATION_CHANGE_VALUE_ITEM_NAME to value item container
      Parameters:
      aValueItemContainer - Value item container
      aVerticalPosition - Vertical position of rotation change value item to be added
      aNodeNames - Node names for rotation change value item
      aValueItemName - Name of value item
      aSimulationBoxChangeInfo - Simulation box change info with rotation change information

    • getZoomBoundaries

      public static double[] getZoomBoundaries(double[] aDataBoundaryValues, double[] aCurrentDataBoundaryValues)
      Returns zoom boundaries Note: In case of internal settings problems a notification is displayed.
      Parameters:
      aDataBoundaryValues - Data boundary values (will be unchanged)
      aCurrentDataBoundaryValues - Current data boundary values (will be unchanged)
